snippet.title: SPEED DREAMS - MPA12 at Milky Five
snippet.description:
We will show you our last works on "Monoposto America 12" category (based on the 2012 Indycar). As we suppose you now, that year all cars started to use the same chassis, and the teams have 3 different engines to mount on the Openwheelers. In our case , these engines are Murasama, Deckard and Spirit on Speed Dreams. We also give these cars tire wear and degradation support.

To ride with this cars, we choose our "Milky Five" track , and as you can see is based on the well known Indianapolis iconic circuit. We hope you enjoy it.

Remind that all in this video is under development. You can find this game and more info about this Open Source project on:
https://www.speed-dreams.net 

#OpenSource #SpeedDreams #SimRacing #MPA12 #Indycar #Indianapolis
